about_the_game:
Embark on an Epic Climb to Power in: The Hero of Pixel Spire

Climb the mysterious tower crafted by the gods, where Fame, Fortune, and Great Power await the Brave. In this Top-Down, Bullet-Hell, RPG, Rogue-Lite; Face relentless challenges with each floor presenting new and unpredictable trials.


  • Choose Your Class: Select from a variety of classes: Warrior, Scout, Shaman, Mage, and MORE! - Each with its own playstyle and abilities.

  • Powerful Spells: The key to your success are powerful abilities/spells, which can be purchased and upgraded to suit your unique run!

  • After each floor, find refuge in The Enclave—a mystical haven where previous tower-climbers reside. Heal your wounds, upgrade your gear, purchase new loot, and prepare for the challenges ahead. When ready, return to the tower and continue your ascent.

  • Upgrade Your Spells: Strategize by choosing your battles and adapting your tactics. If a spell suits your playstyle UPGRADE it to it's more powerful rarity.

  • Level Up: Gain EXP from slaying monsters, level up, and distribute stat points to create the ultimate build.

  • Personalize Your Run: Sometimes RNG can be bad, so Level your hero, select obtained pets and game-changing Gems, and even customize you're Cosmetics to make each and every run your own.

  • Ever-Changing Challenges: No two floors are alike. With dynamic enemy spawning and randomized layouts, each ascent brings new trials to overcome and mysteries to uncover.

  • Boss Battles: Test your skills against formidable bosses guarding the tower’s secrets.

  • Unlock New Spells & NPC's: As you ascend, unlock new spells and find stranded NPC's that will help you face even greater threats!

Are You Ready to Ascend?

Every floor conquered brings you closer to your ultimate goal—dominating the tower and claiming your rightful place as a HERO. But beware, the higher you climb, the more perilous the journey becomes. Do you have what it takes to reach the top?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-650 or AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 or AMD Radeon R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: Any PC built within the last 5 years should be able to run the game.

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The Hero of Pixel Spire is a Fantasy, Bullet-Hell, Rogue-Lite with RPG elements. Clear each floor, Master unique spells, and Ascend the ever-changing tower to become 'THE HERO'. Don't forget to rest in The Enclave though to: Level up, Upgrade your gear, and Prepare for the formidable bosses within.
